Our technology stack

We have expert knowledge and profound expertise
in designing, deploying and supporting all kinds IT environments for users from all over the world.

We use the most modern and efficient stack.
Jenkins and GitLab for CI
Docker as containers
Zabbix and Prometheus for monitoring
Ansible, Puppet / Chef
for configuration management
Kubernetes for orchestration
AWS, Google Cloud, Microsoft Azure
and hybrid clouds as infrastructure.

Why choosing IT Husky?

The most modern approach,
in Infra-as-Code,
CI / CD pipelines, etc.

Deep and profound analysis
of all of IT-environments
and before implementation

Dedicated manager
and team of certified,
highly qualified engineers

platforms and technological
